trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Eo An seeks aid for an ill friend.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Iala Oul.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_TODO_01<tab>Obtain sprigs of Voeburtwort.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the sprigs of Voeburtwort to Iala Oul.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Eo An.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_EOAN_000_000<tab>I'm loath to trouble a visitor such as you, but will you not lend me a hand?
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_EOAN_000_001<tab>You see, a friend of mine is unwell. Accidentally consumed a poisonous plant, it would seem.

TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_EOAN_000_002<tab>A Nu Mou named Iala Oul makes a medicine that can purge the poison. I would take myself to Pla Enni for it, but I dare not leave my friend's side. If you could go in my stead, I would be in your debt.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_EOAN_000_003<tab>It's the Nu Mou named Iala Oul that makes the medicine. If you could go to Pla Enni and obtain it for me, I would be in your debt.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_IALAOUL_000_010<tab>An amaro is unwell, you say? But of course I would be happy to help. Nu Mou or no, I would not forsake those in need.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_IALAOUL_000_011<tab>That being said, as per our custom, I must ask for a fitting payment. Let's see... Yes, four sprigs of Voeburtwort should suffice.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_IALAOUL_000_012<tab>The herb grows in abundance outside the cave in Voeburtenburg. Bring them to me, and I will see that the ailing amaro has his medicine.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_IALAOUL_000_013<tab>Voeburtwort grows in abundance around Voeburtenburg. Bring it to me, and I will see that the ailing amaro has his medicine.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_IALAOUL_000_020<tab>Ah, you're back. Do you have the Voeburtwort?

TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_IALAOUL_000_021<tab>Ah, four sprigs, precisely as requested. This will replace the amount I used to make the medicine, which I should mention has already been delivered to Wolekdorf. It wouldn't do to make the sick and ailing wait, after all.

TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_IALAOUL_000_022<tab>But I must say─and perhaps I'm simply imagining it─even though the amaro I met with was appreciative, there was an aloofness about him at the same time. At any rate, the honorable task is done, and to great satisfaction for all.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_IALAOUL_000_023<tab>If you require anything else, do not hesitate to let me know.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_EOAN_000_030<tab>Yes, Iala Oul indeed came earlier with the medicine. I gave it to my friend at once, and already he is feeling better. Thank you so much for procuring the herbs.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_EOAN_000_031<tab>Now, forgive me if this seems like prying...but how do you find dealing with Iala Oul?
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_EOAN_000_032<tab>Truly? You are a far more patient soul than I am.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_EOAN_000_033<tab>Every time I meet Iala Oul, or indeed most other Nu Mou, they never fail to ask if something ails me. Even when I say no, they press me, again and again.

TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_EOAN_000_034<tab>I realize it is simply the way with them, but it becomes overbearing very quickly. And <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> ails me. Thus do I make a point of keeping my distance with them.
TEXT_LUCKZD012_03419_EOAN_000_035<tab>You should keep your distance as well, lest you be drawn deep into their endless web of tasks.
